name: The First Farmer's Letter
description: A soil-stained letter from the first Coalroot farmer. The ink has faded, but the words remain.
text: To whoever reads this: The earth remembers. Every seed planted, every harvest taken. The machine-god sleeps beneath, but the soil holds our history. Tend it well. â€”Elias Coalroot, Year 1

name: Cracked Music Locket
description: A tarnished brass locket that plays your great-grandfather's melody when opened. The gears are rusted but still turn.

name: Heirloom Seeds
description: Pure seeds saved from before the fall. The last untainted genetics.

name: Grandfather's Broken Contract
description: The torn contract that broke a faction's trust. A stain on the bloodline.
special: Causes NPCs to remember broken promises

name: Scarred Machine Blueprint
description: A blueprint covered in blood stains and scorch marks. The last project before the accident.

name: Root Keeper's Seal
description: A wooden seal carved with living vines. Grants access to hidden groves.
